channel.title: Instructor says this is wrong, inform me of the alternate method to this problem

item.title: Instructor says this is wrong, inform me of the alternate method to this problem
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Can’t you just make lastTalked a Ruler object and then use lastTalked.getIdentity() instead of lastTalked in report()?

Read full topic
item.source: Instructor says this is wrong, inform me of the alternate method to this problem

item.title: Instructor says this is wrong, inform me of the alternate method to this problem
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

This is my first level JAVA programming class and we’re just doing a bunch of basic stuff. My instructor told me that the variable was supposed to be a Class Object and not a String in this case for my variable

Here is the code and output:

public class MainConversation { //----------------------------------------------------------------- // Just initializes the real conversation object. //----------------------------------------------------------------- public static void main (String[] args) { Conversation c; c = new Conversation(); } }

[code=java]public class Conversation
{
private int numRulers;
private Ruler lincoln, cleo, Bush, Elizabeth;

//-----------------------------------------------------------------
// Initializes various rulers, gets them talking to each other.
//-----------------------------------------------------------------
public Conversation()
{
numRulers = 4;
createRulers();
identifyRulers();
System.out.println();
converseRulers();
System.out.println();
reportRulers();
}
public void createRulers()
{
lincoln = new Ruler( “Abraham Lincoln”, “President”, “America”, “Americans” );
cleo = new Ruler( “Cleopatra”,“Queen”, “Egypt”, “Egyptians” );
Bush = new Ruler( “George Bush”, “President”, “America”, “Americans” );
Elizabeth = new Ruler( “Elizabeth”, “Queen”, “England”, “English” );
}
public void identifyRulers()
{
lincoln.identify();
cleo.identify();
Bush.identify();
Elizabeth.identify();
}
public void converseRulers()
{
lincoln.sayHelloTo(cleo);
cleo.sayHelloTo(Bush);
Bush.sayHelloTo(Elizabeth);
Bush.sayHelloTo(cleo);
}

public void reportRulers()
{
	lincoln.report();
	cleo.report();
	Bush.report();
	Elizabeth.report();	
}

}[/code]

[code=java]
public class Ruler
{

private String name, title, country, people, lastTalked;
private int numConversations = 0;

public String getName()
{
	return name;
}

public String getTitle()
{
	return title;
}

public String getCountry()
{
	return country;
}

public String getPeople()
{
	return people;
}

public String getIdentity()
{
	return title + " " + name;
}

public String getIDWithCountry()
{
	return title + " " + name + " of " + country;
}

public String getIDWithPeople()
{
	return title + " " + name + " of the " + people;
}

public Ruler(String nme, String ttl, String cntry, String ppl)
	// Remember my info
{
	people = ppl;
	name = nme;
	title = ttl;
	country = cntry;
	
}
public void identify()
{
	System.out.println("Hello, I am " + name + ", the " + title 
		+ " of " + country + ".");
}
public void sayHelloTo(Ruler otherRuler)
{
	numConversations++;
	System.out.println("Hello " + otherRuler.getIDWithCountry() + ","
		+ " I'm " + getIDWithPeople() + ".");
	lastTalked = otherRuler.getIdentity();
}

public void report()
{
	if (numConversations == 0) 
	{
		System.out.println(getIdentity() + " reporting in for duty without "
		+ "talking to anyone.");
	} else if (numConversations == 1) 
	{
		System.out.println(getIdentity() + " reporting in for duty with "
		+ numConversations + " conversation with " + lastTalked + ".");
	} else
	{
		System.out.println(getIdentity() + " reporting in for duty with "
		+ numConversations + " conversations. The last with " + lastTalked + ".");
	}
}

}[/code]

[code=Output]Hello, I am Abraham Lincoln, the President of America.
Hello, I am Cleopatra, the Queen of Egypt.
Hello, I am George Bush, the President of America.
Hello, I am Elizabeth, the Queen of England.

Hello Queen Cleopatra of Egypt, I’m President Abraham Lincoln of the Americans.
Hello President George Bush of America, I’m Queen Cleopatra of the Egyptians.
Hello Queen Elizabeth of England, I’m President George Bush of the Americans.
Hello Queen Cleopatra of Egypt, I’m President George Bush of the Americans.

President Abraham Lincoln reporting in for duty with 1 conversation with Queen C
leopatra.
Queen Cleopatra reporting in for duty with 1 conversation with President George
Bush.
President George Bush reporting in for duty with 2 conversations. The last with
Queen Cleopatra.
Queen Elizabeth reporting in for duty without talking to anyone.[/code]

So… what exactly am I missing, because my text book doesn’t really say much as far as this type of referencing?

Read full topic
